title: SEO Fundamentals
description: A library of resources to help you learn the basics of search engine optimization.
content: OverviewIf you want to get traffic to your site, search engine optimization is an absolute must. In fact, according to a recent industry study, 57.8% of all website traffic originates from Google (Compared to 5.2% from Facebook and 4.8% from YouTube) Which means that SEO is far from dead. In fact, it’s more important than ever. In this section you’ll learn the basics of SEO, like how search engines work, key Google ranking factors, creating an SEO-friendly website, and more. This page is a library of resources to help you learn the fundamentals of search engine optimization.What Is SEO?A simple answer to the question: “What Is SEO?”. Includes lots of visuals and real life examples. Explore this ResourceSearch Engine PositioningLearn everything you need to know about search engine positioning (and why it’s important for SEO). Explore this ResourceSEO vs. SEMWhat’s the difference between SEO, SEM and PPC? And why does it matter for your marketing efforts? I give you a full breakdown right here. Explore this ResourceSearch Engine Ranking FactorsLearn about the major ranking factors that search engines use to rank websites. Explore this ResourceSEO Best PracticesA list of 10 key SEO best practices to improve organic traffic and rankings, focusing on on-page SEO optimization strategies. Explore this ResourceSEO MetricsLearn exactly how to track your SEO efforts. Includes actionable info and lots of real-world insights. Explore this ResourceSEO Friendly Web DesignA thorough guide to making sure that your website design and development is 100% SEO-friendly. Explore this ResourceWhat Are SERPs?Everything you need to know about “SERPs”, including what they are and why they’re important for SEO. Explore this Resource

Grow your online visibility.
On all key channels.
From just one platform.
